abstract.text: A celestial body in the solar system.

inlineContent.text: This enum represents the Sun, Moon, planets, and select moons
that can be used in astronomical calculations.

abstract.text: User-defined star 8.

The gravitational parameter (mass × G) in AU³/day².
Returns all planetary apsides within a date range.
The Moon.
The Earth (for heliocentric calculations).

The major planets (Mercury through Neptune).

A celestial body in the solar system.
